answerText: Volga River [10] The Volga flows through Moscow in this European country, the largest in the world by area.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 5 | 10 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The Saratov Bridge crosses this river, which rises in the Valdai Hills. For 10 points each: [10] Name this longest river in Europe, which flows into the Caspian Sea after crossing cities such as Nizhny Novgorod and Astrakhan.
